name: Viridescent Dragon RPG Demo
description:
in the world of Lataire, it's Mages (Magic Users) vs Ergons (Energy Users). after 20 years of peace, the five nations are at the brink of war. Charlotte lost her memories and after being discovered in a cave by the traveling Mage, Seleste, they set off on an adventure to restore them. They will encounter friends and foes alike on this journey. Will their actions end up changing the fate of the world?

This is a super early demo using mostly RTP and Open source, Royalty Free assets. Not too much to do so far, only 2 bosses, one dungeon, one accessible Overworld, one explorable town.

Credits:

Music: Wingless Seraph, Impotech, Audionautix, PurplePlanet, PlayonLoop.com

SFX: Freesounds.org

RPG Maker MV RTP assets

Sprites: Lupinos (roofs), indrah (tall doors)

Plugins: Yanfly, SumRndmDde
